post.text: THANK YOU for your service and sacrifice, as well as your confidence in me to serve as Commander-in-Chief. #AmericaFirst!

comment.author: Kailey
comment.text: I seriously can't believe people are supporting this buffoon. Where are your heads at? Are we really about to hire a reality tv host as POTUS?

replies.author: Brennan
